bioconda.name: bamscale
bioconda.summary: BAMscale is a one-step tool for either 1) quantifying and normalizing the coverage of peaks.

biocontainers.name: bamscale
biocontainers.summary: BAMscale is a one-step tool for either 1) quantifying and normalizing the coverage of peaks

biotools.summary: BAMscale is a one-step tool for either 1) quantifying and normalizing the coverage of peaks or 2) generated scaled BigWig files for easy visualization of commonly used DNA-seq capture based methods.

bioschemas.name: BAMscale
bioschemas.summary: BAMscale is a one-step tool for either 1) quantifying and normalizing the coverage of peaks or 2) generated scaled BigWig files for easy visualization of commonly used DNA-seq capture based methods.
